dcterms:description: The PASCAL VOC 2012 dataset is widely used for evaluating semantic segmentation algorithms, containing images with pixel-level annotations for various object classes.
dcterms:title: PASCAL VOC 2012

dcterms:creator: Bharath Hariharan
Pablo Arbeláez
Lubomir Bourdev
Subhransu Maji
Jitendra Malik
dcterms:description: The Semantic Boundaries Dataset (SBD) provides a set of images with semantic boundary annotations, useful for training and evaluating segmentation algorithms.
dcterms:title: SBD (Semantic Boundaries Dataset)

dcterms:creator: Di Feng
Christian Haase-Schütz
Lars Rosenbaum
Heinz Hertlein
Claudius Gläser
Fabian Timm
Werner Wiesbeck
Klaus Dietmayer
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on deep multi-modal object detection and semantic segmentation specifically for autonomous driving applications.
dcterms:title: Deep multi-modal object detection and semantic segmentation for autonomous driving
